text: Hagi anagema hazageno'a, Ahapu'a amanage huno Ben-hadati'ma hianke'ma erino vuno eno'ma hu vahera zamasami'ne, ranimo kini ne'mo'ma, ese'ma nantahigea zantamina kamigahue hu'na hu'noe. Hianagi henkama nantahigeno huoma hiazana osugahue. Hige'za ana vahe'mo'za Ahapu'ma zamasamia kea Ben-hadatina ome asami'naze.
